Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping
Changelog:
- Movement enhancements: plugin will attempt to detect if you're stuck, if it happens, pathfind will be retried few times before all movement will be aborted
- New command: `/at mtf` - Move To Flag - moves you to flag that is set on map with mounting and stuck prevention
- Animation lock is now accounted for while casting and interacting
